title: 1 Thing
lastfmSummary: "1 Thing" is a song by American singer Amerie, released as the lead single from her second studio album, Touch (2005). It was written by Amerie and Rich Harrison, with production handled by Harrison. The song incorporates go-go rhythms and samples the 1970 funk track "Oh, Calcutta!" by the Meters, written by Stanley Walden. In 2004, Amerie began working on her second album and collaborated with producer Rich Harrison, who had contributed to her debut album, All I Have (2002). Read more on Last.fm.
